moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Sonic Boom
moves.description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

moves.name: Eerie Impulse
moves.description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Spark
moves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Charge Beam
moves.description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
